section.title: Collecting the Current Log Set of a Server

procedure.title: To Collect the Current Log Set of a Server

step.para: Click on the Diagnostics accordion, then click the Zone that you want to view.
Select the server that you want to collect logs for.
Click on the Collect Logs tab.

Click
(Collect), then click
(Collect current logs). All current log files in as well as configuration files are collected.
Click OK. The status of the log retrieval shows in the CloudForms Management Engine console.
